quest_1.name: Demon Slayer Initiation
quest_1.description: Complete the Demon Slayer initiation test.
dialogue: Welcome to the Demon Slayer Corps!
Your first task is to complete the initiation test.
Prove your worth and become a true Demon Slayer!

quest_2.name: First Mission
quest_2.description: Embark on your first mission as a Demon Slayer.
dialogue: Your first mission awaits. Be prepared for intense battles.
Remember your training and trust in your abilities.
